column1: #Text='What future do refugees have without proper language training, Canadian education or Canadian work experience?'
#Text=Like all previous waves of immigrants/refugees - find low paid entry level service jobs - drive a cab, clean buildings, manual labour etc, etc.
#Text=All this moaning about subsidized day care and the high cost of tuition!
#Text=Sounds like a case of excessive entitlement and unduly raised expectations.
